meta-description: Read and listen to Surah {{transliteratedName}}. The Surah was revealed in {{revelationPlace}}, ordered {{chapterOrder}} in the Quran. The Surah title means "{{translatedName}}" in {{localeName}} and consists of {{versesCount}} verses.
ranges-meta-desc: Read and listen from Ayah {{rangeFrom}} to Ayah {{rangeTo}}.
